history.proof: srun best use: all_permutations_aux_permutation unfold: all_permutations.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type l1, l2 : list A H : In l1 (all_permutations l2) Unable to unify "permutation [] []" with "permutation l1 l2".
In environment A : Type H1 : permutation [] [] l1, l2 : list A H : In l1 (all_permutations l2) Unable to unify "permutation (?M1870 :: ?M1872) (?M1870 :: ?M1871)" with "permutation l1 l2".
The reference IHpermutation was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Type H2 : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) H0 : permutation [] [] l1, l2 : list A H : In l1 (all_permutations l2) Unable to unify "permutation (?M2181 :: ?M2182 :: ?M2183) (?M2182 :: ?M2181 :: ?M2183)" with "nat".

In environment A : Type H2 : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) H0 : permutation [] [] l1, l2 : list A H : In l1 (all_permutations l2) Unable to unify "permutation ?M2223 ?M2225" with "list (permutation l1 l2)".

original: intros l1 l2 H. induction H. - apply permutation_nil. - intros H'. inversion H'; subst. apply permutation_skip. apply IHpermutation. auto. - apply permutation_swap. - intros H1 H2. apply permutation_trans with (l2 := l2); auto.
